mapper.sql: a.ID AS "id", a.IP AS "ip", a.PORT AS "port", a.PROTOCOL AS "protocol", a.CLIENT_NAME AS "clientName", a.TYPE AS "type", a.STATUS AS "status", a.RETRY AS "retry", a.USERNAME AS "username", a.PASSWORD AS "password", a.CLUSTER AS "cluster", a.DEFAULT_PARAM AS "defaultParam", a.TAG AS "tag", a.GROUP AS "group", a.SECRET_KEY AS "secretKey", a.ACCESS_KEY AS "accessKey", a.NETWORK_TYPE AS "networkType", a.VPN_ACCONT AS "vpnAccount", a.VPN_PASSWORD AS "vpnPassword"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SRIG_MQ_SERVER(ID, IP, PORT, CLIENT_NAME, PROTOCOL, TYPE, STATUS, USERNAME, PASSWORD, UPDATE_TIME, CREATE_TIME, RETRY, CLUSTER, DEFAULT_PARAM, TAG, GROUP, SECRET_KEY, ACCESS_KEY) VALUES (#{id}, #{ip}, #{port}, #{clientName}, #{protocol}, #{type}, #{status}, #{username}, #{password}, #{updateDate}, #{createDate}, #{retry}, #{cluster}, #{defaultParam}, #{tag}, #{group}, #{secretKey}, #{accessKey})
